name: 李仁貴
objective:
1.電腦網路概述
2.階層結構
3.路由與交換
4.流量與擁塞控制
5.媒體存取控制
6.區域網路協定與標準
７．網路互連
８．效能評估
schedule:
Chapter 1: Introduction
Use of Networks, Network Hardware, Network Software
Reference Models, Example Networks, Standardization
Chapter 2: The Physical Layer
Transmission Media:Twisted Pair, Coaxial Cable, Fiber Optics, Wireless
Chapter 3: The Data Link Layer
Error Control, Flow Control, Protocol
Chapter 4: The Medium Access Control Sublayer
Multiple Access, Ethernet, WLAN, Broadband Wireless, Bluetooth
Chapter 5: The Network Layer
Routing, Congestion Control, QoS, InterNetworking
Chapter 6: The Transport Layer
TCP , UDP
Chapter 7: Application Layer
DNS, Mail, WWW, Multimedia
Chapter 8: Network Security
scorePolicy: 評量：學期成績=(1)二次考試+(2)平時成績(作業+測驗)
materials:
一、.教材： (1)基本教材： A. S. Tanenbaum, Computer Networks, 2003, 新月圖書，台北。
(2)教師自編講義
二、.參考資料：
[1] Computer Networking: A Top Down Approach Featuring the Internet, 2nd edition. Jim Kurose, Keith Ross Addison-Wesley, July 2002.
[2] Computer Networks and Internets with Internet Applications, 3th edition. Douglas E. Comer. Prentice Hall, 2001.
[3] Data Communications and Networks, Achyut S. Godbole, McGraw Hill, 2003. (全華)
經濟部技術處產業技術白皮書
(2)行政院科技顧問組，(民89年)行政院「第四次生物技術策略(SRB)會議」會議資料。
